directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels. Tear bacon into small pieces.
Combine broccoli, bacon, sunflower seeds, and green onions in a bowl.
Whisk mayonnaise, vinegar, and sugar together in a bowl; pour over broccoli mixture and toss to coat.
title: Broccoli and Bacon Salad
